sections.title: What we do
paras: At F3 Sports we are on a mission to revolutionising the way the people of India approach sports. Ours is a first of its kind sports science training in Pune. F3â€™s team of sports science experts are introducing scientific methods and processes for mentoring athletes and achieving sporting excellence both at the developmental stage as well as elite level.

We have a team of highly specialised, qualified and experienced sport physicians, sports psychologist, strength and conditioning trainers, physiotherapists, sports nutrition and biomechanics experts to look into the day to day needs of the athletes physical as well as mental well-being.

team.name: Satish Gaikwad
team.about: Satish is the master par excellence who is a ICC coach and has a decade os experience, having worked with over 15,000 players including international, national and ranji trophy players. He has worked for well-known academies around the world which includes academies in UK, Dubai and Sri-Lanka.

team.name: Swati Saraf
team.about: Swati is a megamind with tons of experience and insights into the day-to-day operations and an unparalleled experience of 12 years. She has an eye for detail and has the most effective, economic and empact heavy solutions for our clients.
